column4: Anyone know how to troubleshoot sound problems with Terminal Server Client?
Anyone know a good macro program for Linux, to repeat mouse clicks?
what do you want to achieve?
just trying to make my mouse do about 1500 mouse clicks for me.  to save my hand...
i move my mouse to the bottom right of the window, pess a button, move the mouse to the top right press a button. i do that about 1500 moe times, and i'm done
just curious, why do you need to do this?
note: I don't know of any macro programs
I added about 1200 categories to my site accidently, instead of making them sub-categories.  the method for removal is to remove them one at a time.
ezmacros works great in windows. i'm thinking of just downloading it, and running it thorugh wine
what are those categories you're talking about?
product categories, in a store on a website.
can't you just edit a file?
i have direct access to the SQL database, but i'm not sure if it would damage dependancies by removing the categories.  and would rather not risk it.
so you're using some kind of graphical front-end to access the SQL database?
